txt.en: Despite inadvertently revealing a number of roots, you have successfully culled the population of neeker-breekers back to a more reasonable level, and Quickbeam's Huorn appears far less agitated. Through your efforts, the soil of Fangorn Forest shall remain rich and give rise to new life.
You have defeated many neeker-breekers and aided in preserving the forest's soil.
Neeker-breekers have been digging under Fangorn Forest, loosening the soil and wreaking havoc on the trees above.

As you look around, you notice the earth beneath you has been violently disturbed. Before you can think on this further, a neeker-breeker burrows out from the ground under Quickbeam's Huorn and is almost immediately crushed by one its enormous roots.\n\nThe soil displaced by the neeker-breeker appears dry and lifeless. You should investigate disturbed earth and prevent them from causing harm to the forest floor.
Neeker-breekers can be found in northern Fangorn Forest.\n\nQuickbeam's Huorn has asked for your aid in culling neeker-breekers before they can cause any more harm to the rich soil of the forest.
